name: SHATTERED (itch) (Johnsensei)
description:
SHATTERED is a narrative-driven 3D drag-and-drop puzzle game that was created for the 2018 Global Game Jam in Nashville, TN USA.

The outcast wizard Modris has crystalized and shattered three of his pursuers: a thief, a bounty hunter, and the mage Vivian. An apprentice of Vivian has hired you to find the cave where their shattered pieces lie and reassemble Vivian. Only Vivian has the power to restore the others so they may again pursue and finally defeat Modris.

Controls:

Look around with the mouse. Click and hold to drag the pieces to the center of the room to try and reassemble Vivian.
